package corejavaassignment;

import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.TreeSet;

public class sortbalance implements Comparator<accountTree> {

	@Override
	public int compare(accountTree a1, accountTree a2) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return a1.getBalance()-a2.getBalance();
	}

	void createset(TreeSet<accountTree> ts)
	{
	ts.add(new accountTree(1,"harika",24000));
	ts.add(new accountTree(5,"dolly",20000));
	ts.add(new accountTree(4,"pranathi",39000));
	ts.add(new accountTree(2,"prathyusha",45000));
	ts.add(new accountTree(3,"sravani",55000));
	}
}
